Package org.ejbca.core.model.approval.profile

Class ApprovalProfileBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.internal.UpgradeableDataHashMap
      • org.cesecore.profiles.ProfileBase
        • org.ejbca.core.model.approval.profile.ApprovalProfileBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<ApprovalProfile>, IUpgradeableData, Profile, ApprovalProfile
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccumulativeApprovalProfile, PartitionedApprovalProfile
    public abstract class ApprovalProfileBase
extends ProfileBase
implements ApprovalProfile, Cloneable
    Implementation of the ProfileBase class, common functionality for all approval type profiles.
    Version:
    $Id: ApprovalProfileBase.java 29022 2018-05-24 19:35:09Z bastianf $
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isApprovalAuthorized

        public boolean isApprovalAuthorized​(Collection<Approval> approvalsPerformed,
                                    Approval approval)
                             throws AuthenticationFailedException
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalProfile
        Returns true if the approval is authorized for the step and partition it covers, and that all preceding steps are satisfied.
        Specified by:
        isApprovalAuthorized in interface ApprovalProfile
        Parameters:
        approvalsPerformed - the already registered approvals
        approval - the new approval
        Returns:
        true if the given approval is authorized
        Throws:
        AuthenticationFailedException - if the authentication token in the approval wasn't valid

      • isStepSatisfied

        protected boolean isStepSatisfied​(ApprovalStep approvalStep,
                                  Collection<Approval> approvalsPerformed)
                           throws AuthenticationFailedException
        Parameters:
        approvalStep - Step
        approvalsPerformed - Approvals
        Returns:
        true if the list of approvals validates the given step
        Throws:
        AuthenticationFailedException - if the authentication token in the approval doesn't check out

      • getRemainingApprovalsInPartition

        public int getRemainingApprovalsInPartition​(Collection<Approval> approvalsPerformed,
                                            int stepIdentifier,
                                            int partitionIdentifier)
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalProfile
        Return the number of required approvals of the specified partition that have not yet been approved
        Specified by:
        getRemainingApprovalsInPartition in interface ApprovalProfile
        Parameters:
        approvalsPerformed - a collection of performed approvals
        stepIdentifier - the ID of the step to check in
        partitionIdentifier - the ID of the partition to check in
        Returns:
        the number of required approvals of the specified partition that has not yet been approved, or ApprovalDataVO.STATUS_EXECUTIONDENIED (-7) if partition has been denied.

      • updateCAIds

        public boolean updateCAIds​(int fromId,
                           int toId,
                           String toSubjectDN)
        Description copied from interface: ApprovalProfile
        Updates any references to a CA's CAId and Subject DN. Approval Profiles can contain CA Id references in the list of allowed roles of the steps.
        Specified by:
        updateCAIds in interface ApprovalProfile
        Parameters:
        fromId - Old CA Id to replace.
        toId - New CA Id to replace with.
        toSubjectDN - New CA Subject DN.
        Returns:
        True if the approval profile was changed. If so it should be persisted to the database.
